snippet: For-profit hospices are more likely than nonprofits to serve patients in institutions and to exceed Medicare cost limits, a new study found.
abstract: For-profit hospices are more likely than nonprofits to serve patients in institutions and to exceed Medicare cost limits, a new study found.

headline.main: Differences in Care at For-Profit Hospices
